name: C++ Inline File
summary: Learn about .INL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: INL files can be used as an alternative to placing implementations of inline functions in header files (.H or .HPP files). Both INL files and header files can be inserted in C++ program code using the #include directive.

description: Source code file used by Microsoft C++ compilers; contains inline functions that can be included into C++ programs; used for storing reusable program components.
